details.name: Dry Time
details.info:
Recoat:  1 hour
Cure:  7 days
*Measured at 25°C and 50% relative humidity

details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
10 sq. m. per 2mm coat
*Depending on surface texture and porosity
* per 4-Liters

details.name: Mixing Ratio
details.info: Approximately 5-kg cement per 4-Liters of K-201 High Performance Acrylic Skimcoat
